STATEMENT

OF THE

PUBLIC ACCOUNTS

OF THE

NORTH-WEST TERRITORIES

FOR THE

Financial Year Ended August 31st

1897

PUBLISHED BY AUTHORITY OF THE LEGISLATIVE ASSEMBLY.

REGINA

JOHN ALEXANDER REID, QUEEN'S PRINTER FOR THE TERRITORIES

1898
To His Honour

CHARLES HERBERT MACKINTOSH

Lieutenant Governor of the North-West Territories.

May it please Your Honour:

The undersigned has the honour to lay before Your Honour the Public Accounts of the North-West Territories, for the financial year ended August 31, 1897.

F. W. G. HAULTAIN,

Territorial Treasurer.

REGINA, November 10, 1897.
PART I

REVENUE
